description:
With Miyu swallowed by the Heroic Spirit, Illya seizes Ruby and Sapphire in each hand, transforming into her Zwei Form to draw Miyu out and slap her. She faces the greatest Heroic Spirit of all, who bears a sword that can rend the world. Prepared to sacrifice everything she has, Illya fights to save her precious friend, Miyu. What fate will her feelings lead to?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Calling Your Name from a Corner of the World
D`un recoin du monde, j`appelle ton nom
Sekai no Katasumi de Kimi no Na o
世界の片隅で君の名を
